channel.title: Tag: insanity - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: On the Yak Shaving Habits of a Writer
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: Writing is apparently so important to me that I procrastinate like crazy rather than risk failing at it.</body></html>
